Description: Part of the leg of a chair or table, made of wood, in the form of a lion's paw, with flat back, 4 toes, and 5 grooves around centre.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Amarna, el-, TA:21/397 The Workmen's Village, Main Street, House No 2, Type A, Front Hall.
Curator's comments: Peet & Woolley, City of Akhenaten I: 75, pl.XXII, fig 3.
